nodes.text: Zakkegs were a species of creature known for being crafty and stubborn. The mercenary Saponza compared the Tusken Raider known as the Jundland General to a zakkeg after discovering that he had several heavily fortified bases. Associates of the smuggler Liana Kor described her as being as "stubborn as a zakkeg, and twice as mean."

Zakkegs were a species originally created for use in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, a Star Wars Legends video game released by BioWare in 2004. They were made canon when mentioned in Star Wars: Commander, a mobile game released by DeNA Co., Ltd. in 2014.
